Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Electronic warfare system false alerts. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Navigation System component.
Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 19/01/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel
